{{Description|The power of the spirits is no falsehood. Burdened with her orders, the divine maiden hurries on!}}
'''Spring Spirit Summoning''' is [[Shenhe]]'s [[Elemental Skill]].

==Gameplay Notes==
* {{Talent Note|particles|3|4}}
* {{Talent Note|character=Shenhe|talent=Spring Spirit Summoning|dynamic buff|ATK}}
* The resulting Icy Quill DMG Bonus is flat and is expressed as:<br><math>[(\% \text{ Skill} \times \text{Skill Attribute}) + (\% \text{ DMG Bonus}</math><math>\times \text{ATK}_\text{Shenhe})]</math><math>\times(\text{DMG Multipliers})</math>

;<big>Passive Effects</big>
* {{Talent Note|character=Shenhe|talent=Spring Spirit Summoning|ascension|2|Spirit Communion Seal|After using this talent, all nearby party members have their damage increased as follows:}}
** Press: 15% increase to Elemental Skill and Elemental Burst DMG for 10s.
** Hold: 15% increase to Normal, Charged, and Plunging Attack DMG for 15s.

;<big>Constellation Effects</big>
* {{Talent Note|constellation|1|Clarity of Heart}}
* {{Talent Note|constellation|3|Seclusion}}
* {{Talent Note|constellation|4|Insight|When characters trigger the Icy Quill bonus DMG effect, Shenhe gains one Skyfrost Mantra stack. The next time Shenhe uses Spring Spirit Summoning, its damage is increased by 5% for each stack of Skyfrost Mantra, which Shenhe consumes after using Spring Spirit Summoning. Stacks last for 60 seconds and have a maximum of 50 stacks.}}
* {{Talent Note|constellation|6|Mystical Abandon}}
